# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="e77ad-102">在 Outlook.com 中添加标志和提醒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e77ad-103">若要设置或编辑事件的提醒，请执行以下操作：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e77ad-104">转到 "[日历](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/)"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e77ad-105">选择要提醒的事件，然后选择右上角的箭头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e77ad-106">将其展开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e77ad-107">在 "**提醒我**" 旁边，选择提醒时间。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="e77ad-108">Outlook.com 将自动保存所做的更改。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e77ad-109">若要提醒自己跟进邮件，您可以添加后续标志：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e77ad-110">转到 "[邮件](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e77ad-111">在邮件列表中，将鼠标悬停在邮件上以查看 "标志" 选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e77ad-112">选择标记图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e77ad-113">以标记邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e77ad-114">若要查看所有已标记的邮件，请选中页面左下角的复选标记以转到 "任务"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="e77ad-115">若要了解详细信息，请参阅[在 Outlook.com 中标记或固定邮件](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e77ad-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
